name: Easy Drift
description:
Welcome to Easydrift A super casual drift game that is only at the beginning The goal of the game is to succeed in finishing the track with the best possible time or best score drift

I will add a track creation system to enrich and vary the game according to the players, as well as a leaderboard to compare your times with players around the world Feel free to participate by giving your ideas to make it a cool game :) In the meantime, you can already practice on this track.
